e803943ff515fbec5a2bbdae948af3dd018669a1.commitMessage: Issue #3496: Enforce ReturnCount max=1 in com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.gui, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.whitespace, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.doclets

02bc165a36f90bbcb638ffba74d9b3139a65d89f.commitMessage: Issue #2603: add allowEmptyLambda parameter to WhitespaceAroundCheck

4c078ba710068498ca513ce115993e30dab4562a.commitMessage:
Make "private" methods "static" where possible. #46

SonarQube rule: ["private" methods that don't access instance data should be "static"](http://nemo.sonarqube.org/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS2325).

Rationale: private methods that don't access instance data can be static to prevent any misunderstanding about the contract of the method.

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

89ee699fae396abf7706ecaa59e8dbe6c833a67d.commitMessage: Applied patch 906531 (WhitespaceAround allows empty method/ctor bodies.)  Thanks to  Eric Roe
